<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analyzeBranch - Analyze the branching code at the end of MBB, returning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// true if it cannot be understood (e.g. it&#39;s a switch dispatch or isn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implemented for a target).  Upon success, this returns false and returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with the following information in various cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 If this block ends with no branches (it just falls through to its succ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    just return false, leaving TBB/FBB null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 If this block ends with only an unconditional branch, it sets TBB to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    the destination block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 If this block ends with an conditional branch and it falls through to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    an successor block, it sets TBB to be the branch destination block and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    list of operands that evaluate the condition. These</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    operands can be passed to other TargetInstrInfo methods to create new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 4 If this block ends with an conditional branch and an unconditional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    block, it returns the &#39;true&#39; destination in TBB, the &#39;false&#39; destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    in FBB, and a list of operands that evaluate the condition. These</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    operands can be passed to other TargetInstrInfo methods to create new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that removeBranch and insertBranch must be implemented to support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cases where this method returns success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxinstrinfo/#ac741087fd882a50ae09491bdaebcaad9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxinstrinfo/#ac741087fd882a50ae09491bdaebcaad9">NVPTXInstrInfo::analyzeBranch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a1441f79530bc7f3a89118bb8067eac69">TBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;FBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineOperand&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowModify)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the block has no terminators, it just falls into the block after it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin() || !isUnpredicatedTerminator(&#42;--<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the last instruction in the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;LastInst = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is only one terminator instruction, process it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin() || !isUnpredicatedTerminator(&#42;--<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == NVPTX::GOTO) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a1441f79530bc7f3a89118bb8067eac69">TBB</a> = LastInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a57e64b633278df75c699e6b98ce15031">getMBB</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == NVPTX::CBranch) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Block ends with fall-through condbranch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a1441f79530bc7f3a89118bb8067eac69">TBB</a> = LastInst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a57e64b633278df75c699e6b98ce15031">getMBB</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, don&#39;t know what this is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
